2.1.2.1.8. date_time.to_http_datetime¶

date_time.to_http_datetime(date_time)¶

Format datetime to the preferred HTTP Full Date format, which is a fixed-length subset of that defined by RFC 1123. - http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec3.html#sec3.3.1 - Takes timezone information into account if included in the datetime. - A naive datetime (no timezone information) is assumed to be in UTC.
